name: Avoid using MERGE
description: This rule searches for Cobol programs using the MERGE statement.
output:
Associated to each COBOL Program with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in source code:
  - MERGE statement
rationale: COBOL merges are known to be inefficient on zOS environment. It is better to use external merge.
remediation: Remove all unnecessary MERGE action and replace them by external tool.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
MIPS-Reduction - focus on data access efficiency
